text: Pulkovsky meridian Municipal Okrug () is a municipal okrug in Moskovsky District, one of the eighty-one low-level municipal divisions of the federal city of St. Petersburg, Russia.Law #411-68 As of the 2010 Census, its population was 43,259, down from 46,515 recorded during the 2002 Census. Until August 2008, it was known as Municipal Okrug #47 (). ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * Category:Moskovsky District, Saint Petersburg
title: Pulkovsky meridian Municipal Okrug
